text:
Tom Yum Ban Mian

Ban Mian
📍 437 Fernvale Rd, #01-01, Singapore 790437

🍜 Food wise: Not too bad Tom Yum Ban Mian, sufficiently flavoured soup, sour and spicy, along with chewy but part of it slightly tough noodles. Not sure of the vegetables, slightly bitter.

✨ Ambience wise: Coffeeshop!

🤵🏻 Service wise: Great!

💵 Price wise: $
Mee hoon kuay all clumpy and stuck together. Texture and shape is not correct too.
Delicious bowl of Tom Yum U-Mian 幼面 served!😋
Best Tom yum ban mian in Fernvale!
Ate their you mian soup twice and liked it, comfy food to eat, thumbs up. I feel their you mian soup is definitely better than the Ah Fang at near Jln Kayu. Even the ikan bilis is better also..
